title: tb logo font
content:
Hi friends

Again please help me id the font used for the logo tb  
 [http://www.toibocks.com/images/r\_gutter\_main01.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417150442/http:/www.toibocks.com/images/r_gutter_main01.jpg)

thanks in advance

Miguel
author: hernando

comments.content:
are you sure Stephen? yes youa re right about Toibocks but what about tb?  
anyone know which font is used for tb ?  
 [http://www.toibocks.com/images/r\_gutter\_main01.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417150442/http:/www.toibocks.com/images/r_gutter_main01.jpg)

thanks in advance

Miguel
Whoops. The first time I clicked your link I got to a different image. Sorry about that.

Actually it's Calibri! A very fun font. I like when we type Ultimate it connects the t and the i. If you have any other questions you can feel free to email me through the ToiBocks site. Have a great day! Dawn, [http://www.ToiBocks.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417150442/http:/www.toibocks.com/ "http://www.ToiBocks.com")
